title: Telegram iOS update brings download manager, live streaming, and more
content:
Telegram has updated its app on iOS bringing new features to more easily manage downloads, new t.me pages, a new attachment menu, and more. The cross-platform messaging service is a popular app due to its enhanced privacy and encryption features. This update offers new tools for users to make the most of their messaging experience.

more…

The post Telegram iOS update brings download manager, live streaming, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
